Don't just shout at the wind. - Raptor persecution Cats Pesticides Foxhunting  Leadshot Mass gamebird releases  Badger Culls  #stateofnature We're making progress but we must act for the Nature we love @DefraNature @EnvAgency

@tayz_BETH @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @stopthestink Starting to happen more often in kidsgrove and talke . The gas radius is spreading and that just CANNOT be normal or ok in any way no matter what they say in their statements. Even 1 mile is too far as far as I‚Äôm concerned

tweets.text: @poppers82 @tayz_BETH @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @stopthestink I've just driven down the D road and it was absolutely vile around the A34 turnoff and then noticeable until Wolstanton . Got to by Garners and it was stomach turning , reported to EA yet again .

Can I also add they have deliveries from well outside the local area such as north Wales and Manchester which have massively polluting lorries carrying all that stuff . @EnvAgencyMids have allowed them to increase the number of lorries and the tonnage to increase from 250,000

@tayz_BETH @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @stopthestink It looks more horrific when seen as a map. Their stance of innocence is nothing less than astounding. What does it actually take for the authorities to wake up and see the untold damage this is causing?
@DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice you have to act you are responsible.

It‚Äôs time for a public apology from @EnvAgencyMids surely @SimonTagg and @AaronBell4NUL . I won‚Äôt hold my breath but this is what residents have been saying for months, years and have been completely gaslit! https://t.co/GmUd1ugEvB

So tonight on his jolly jaunt the smell from #WalleysQuarrey has made it 7 miles to Kidsgrove. If this isnt nuisence level what is @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @stopthestink #stopthestink https://t.co/ranvpF81Jx
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Nothing, they never do #stopthestink #capitoff.
@EnvAgency Walleys Quarry are required to keep records so please do look through them . In case of any doubt taken from their permit . https://t.co/iUj4M8xOYZ

The constant exposure of utterly corrupt water companies in the #UK is sickening. Few are clean, so many simply dump raw #sewage in our rivers and seas under the pretext of one excuse or another.
#StopPolluting!
@SouthWestWater @thameswater and the rest.
https://t.co/2rD7njpKaM

Tomorrow @BBCCountryfile reveals the mass housing freeze across England. This includes the protected Wye, where @EnvAgency believes c.60% of the phosphates pollution problem is down to diffuse agriculture. New homes a fraction of nutrient loading yet the sector here is closed. https://t.co/bbI9aq9crS

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

tweets.text:
And the @EnvAgency does what exactly?

https://t.co/neO7mzoVRf

@LucyABeaumont @EnvAgencyNW Thank you highlighting this environmental catastrophe. We are suffering so much here and it‚Äôs mind boggling how @EnvAgencyMids is allowing it to continue!#stopthestink https://t.co/wNmFhnyIso

More agricultural muck stored against the rules, literally on top of a watercourse this time. Directly under the muck pile runs a drainage ditch that runs straight into the River Frome, which runs straight into the Lugg, which exceeds phosphate limits. @EnvAgency /1 https://t.co/IhAXZqe2gs

urls.title: Water firms are main source of microplastics in UK rivers, study says
urls.description: Research says discharge of untreated sewage and wastewater during dry spells to blame

tweets.text:
Important new research out today by @Jamie_Woodward_ & others identifies water firms as the main source of microplastics in UK rivers. 

Builds more pressure on government @EnvAgency to tackle the way water firms release untreated effluent into our rivers.
https://t.co/HKK1Ar0abP

About sewage discharges for the start of the bathing water season, https://t.co/4X1CLAgkS6 about 18mins in from the start of the programme. radio 4 Today programme. We must not forget @EnvAgency this should only happen in exceptional circumstances not part of a routine.
I hope @AaronBell4NUL really goes for it on Wednesday in the @HouseofCommons. People are suffering because of @RedIndustries2 failures and @EnvAgency's failures. https://t.co/9rTGyVYfJj

urls.title: Wastewater is 'polluting rivers with microplastic'
urls.description: "Frequent releases" of sewage create microplastic hotspots in UK rivers.

tweets.text:
@PJennings88 @EnvAgency As yesterday's Manchester University research confirmed.

"To produce such high levels of [plastics] contamination, [they] must be releasing wastewater into low flows - so when there isn't heavy rain."

Who'd have guessed.

https://t.co/neO7mzoVRf

@alanrevel @SaveLeaMarshes @HMUG_Hackney There are people fishing there. Saw some this evening and have seen some most weekends even though it‚Äôs the closed season. Not sure what can be gone about it.

urls.description: The EA have failed us. Time for a backup plan‚Ä¶ The Landfill Stinks Cap It Off needs your support for Legal fund to Stop The Stink

tweets.text:
Today hundreds of children are breathing in toxic air in Silverdale due to toxic landfill fumes, the environmental agency @EnvAgencyNW is not working quick enough, this is an emergency. Please share and if you can donate https://t.co/kDuVm2eZef
https://t.co/aIHidTSozg

FG is aiming to be Bristols first climate resiliant development and we have been looking at the designs of other new communities from around the world that have sought to address flood risk in an attractive and practical way... https://t.co/uXhoUhO68c
That‚Äôs in addition to god knows what else they‚Äôve dumped in there . https://t.co/LSNUGnACYL

@FromeGateway @GavinBridgeUK @SpatiaUK @EnvAgency @BristolOneCity @BristolCouncil @HTADesignLLP @AYSouthWestView @ArupGroup Shouldn‚Äôt FG be more than ‚Äòinteresting‚Äô homes? I‚Äôve never seen one comment or image showing employment related options. My client based in the made demise of FG employs +50 members of locally skilled staff feels ignored and has never been contacted about this utopian dream.

@CleanIlkley @HugoSAS @Marthakearney @BBCr4today @sascampaigns @amyslack84 @Feargal_Sharkey @Sewagefreeswim @WindrushWasp Fascinating. Would love to hear how @EnvAgency can justify such a practice. It smells like deliberate misrepresentation of water quality, wholly contrary to the public interest. Now why would they want to do that? ü§î

tweets.text: @Malvernmeet @stushurlock @RobGMacfarlane @EnvAgency We all have a responsibility to reduce plastic waste - absolutely. We also need to rethink urban drainage and increase green spaces to reduce runoff and take pressure off the sewer system. Dumping untreated wastewater into rivers during low flows is not acceptable.
@StinkStopthe @LucyABeaumont @EnvAgencyNW @EnvAgencyMids Thank you Lucy you are amazing! #stopthestink

@JudyBrownsword @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Weather (wind direction/speed) and local topography will have some part to play too. People in the Westlands had the problem a couple of days ago with a gentle N/NE wind.

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @Tus_M_ @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA Capped ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£ yeah ok #binbags

@davemh72 @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg That really is interesting and to our knowledge has never been undertaken. Is this in the hands of @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency to ensure compliance? If so why haven't they? Is the site manager being alerted to complaints in real time? 
@StinkStopthe
@HelenVi00175623 @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency I was thinking exactly the same Helen . Yet more @EnvAgencyMids failures ?
@HelenVi00175623 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @Cap_it_off Stinks every time we drive past

@HugoSAS @Marthakearney @BBCr4today @sascampaigns @amyslack84 @Feargal_Sharkey @Sewagefreeswim @WindrushWasp Hi Hugo. The problem is that we were awarded designation for the stretch that includes the sewage works. EA only testing upstream and including 1/10th of what was awarded. So the data on sas app is only for cso above the testing not the actual stretch we applied for & was awarded

tweets.text: @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency There are waste of time, allowing us to live in gas chambers in @NewsNBC from landfill gas find out more @StinkStopthe

Bathing water season has started! üåäüåä

To help you plan, you can check how clean the water is at your local beach or further afield before heading out.

tweets.text: An abundance of water in the Usk reservoir. @EnvAgencySE this is what a reservoir looks like and our chalk streams and beleaguered groundwater need something similar. What are you doing about it ? @AquiferChalk https://t.co/EXQIHh4NUo
@StinkStopthe @HelenVi00175623 @LucyABeaumont @EnvAgencyNW Thank you Lucy it‚Äôs very much appreciated
@LucyABeaumont @EnvAgencyNW Only just seen that you tweeted this thank you so much!

The @EnvAgency accepts nothing & have not apologised for their regulation of the site & inaction which has allowed a downward spiral since complaints rose. They will have their day in court  @Cap_it_off @DefraGovUK #stopthestink @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/YzgLWhjlCC

tweets.text: Am so sorry to hear this Charles, this is ridiculous and awful that you can‚Äôt even convalesce in your own home. This has to STOP @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice #stopthestink @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency https://t.co/Zdt9ldgR8r
@StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA What is all this uncovered waste from timestamp 0.45 onwards? Doesn‚Äôt look well managed to me. @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg

We‚Äôve been carrying out debris clearance on #Osbaldwick Beck as it runs through #Hullroadpark in #York today. We‚Äôve removed a significant amount of rubbish from the Beck in order to further support efforts to restore it to a more natural state. https://t.co/Y03os1gstl

Solidarity with friends @Mullaghglass123 We know your feelings of desperation when landfill gas assaults your home‚Äôchildren &there‚Äôs not a thing you can https://t.co/7h7HHTbKY7 sleep&health harms üòî @EnvAgency @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice #stopthestink @Cap_it_off https://t.co/0jax1NTQ3G

tweets.text: @stushurlock @RobGMacfarlane @EnvAgency No that is quite wrong. Conventional treatment will remove well over 90% of the microplastic load. This is well known. We are just asking them to treat the waste. Nothing more.

@RobGMacfarlane @Jamie_Woodward_ @EnvAgency On top of this we know that pharmaceuticals will be released with untreated sewage too. Bad for humans and the rest of the natural world. Clean up your act @thameswater. Pharmaceutical companies are starting to thanks to @PharmDeclares
6 loads! what was happening before the @EnvAgencyMids made you check every load! https://t.co/08NjiPSfYN
@StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids So a spot check finds 6 loads when they make the effort that 42 a week. So 2184 a year and you wonder why we suffer.

So tonight Walley is taking a 3.5 mile hike to plague the poor folks of Halmerend. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_uk @MattHancock @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @StinkStopthe 
#plague https://t.co/CwBralrlcr

tweets.text: The lack of information is painful. We could find out more ourselves given half a chance. The @EnvAgency must think we are stupid! Follow the money trail & check consignment notes both ends - or are you too afraid to open potential cans of worms @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink https://t.co/VyZbTkgynC

We've got Rivers in our free real time water quality info service! And we've given it a fresh new look and some exciting new features. Download from you app store TODAY #TogetherForRivers #EndSewagePollution @sascampaigns @theriverstrust @CleanIlkley #WarleighWeir https://t.co/QaO2MnneHW
